descriptionHtml:
This mod adds poses for screenshots.
Several poses are adjusted to male character.

[b]Requirement:
[/b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11811][b]Fores New Idles in Skyrim - FNIS[/b][/url]

1.Install this MOD and run "GenerateFNISforUsers.exe".
2.Favorite two rings "KinokoPose Select" and "KinokoPose Player" (those are added to your inventory automatically when you activate this mod), and set hotkeys.
3.Press the hotkey of "KinokoPose Select" and select pose.
4.Press the hotkey of "KinokoPose Player".ã€€For NPC, cast "KinokoPose NPCPlayer" (lesser power)

[b]Credits:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11811]Fores New Idles in Skyrim - FNIS by fore[/url]

[url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/]Pinup Poser S by Halofarm[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34671/]Animation Tools N3 - with IK armature by Anton[/url]

Animation Tools N3 Rig Custom by tktk
author: cryptoporus
